allow:
Bash(git -C /Users/ramonnuila/Documents/GitHub/codebrand/solutions commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve Response body already used error in service worker

Clone response before consuming body in staleWhileRevalidate strategy.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: update dependencies to resolve security vulnerabilities

Fixes 2 high severity vulnerabilities:
- fast-xml-parser: RangeError DoS
- tar: Arbitrary File Creation via Hardlink Path Traversal

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/ramonnuila/Documents/GitHub/codebrand/solutions commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve animation visibility issues on Chrome iOS mobile

- Replace CSS variable animations with direct keyframe references for 
  better Safari/Chrome iOS compatibility
- Extend mobile breakpoint from 640px to 767px to match GSAP threshold
- Force visibility on all GSAP-animated elements on mobile
- Bump service worker version to clear cached CSS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/ramonnuila/Documents/GitHub/codebrand/solutions commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf: cache third-party scripts with stale-while-revalidate

- Add THIRD_PARTY_CACHE for Facebook, Ahrefs, GTM scripts
- Cache Google profile images from lh3.googleusercontent.com
- Only exclude tracking pixels/beacons \(not scripts\) from cache
- Improves repeat visit performance for analytics scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/ramonnuila/Documents/GitHub/codebrand/solutions commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf: reduce render-blocking CSS with inline stylesheets

- Enable Astro''s inlineStylesheets: ''auto'' to inline CSS under 4kb
- Update font preload hints to use correct WOFF2 paths
- Larger CSS files will be preloaded instead of blocking render

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/ramonnuila/Documents/GitHub/codebrand/solutions commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf: bundle React + JSX runtime to eliminate module waterfall

Combine react, react-dom, and jsx-runtime into single chunk
to prevent sequential loading \(1.5s + 1.6s + 1.6s cascade\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
